body: Borderline acceptable, ugly guy is not as fat as a pig, nor as heartless as a swain. Clearly, Selvaria is not anymore under mind-break during the 2nd session, of course the last untranslated page solidified that she, Selvaria, and the acceptable ugly guy as a couple. One more thing, ugly guy is very thankful and joyful to present a woman to his grandmother. "Heart-warming" to say the least. Nonetheless, dem ass-
Where's Leopard Hon 15? I feel incomplete :(
it became a bit of heartwarming after seeing the epilogue on untranslated page
Great artwork ruined by an ugly ass guy. Again. Well, at least he isn't seen too much(his face, I mean).
